plot: A german science program about mind and brain. How do we learn and think? Why do we act and feel like we do? The current brain research can give us sometimes surprising answers. Presented by Prof. Dr. Manfred Spitzer.
plot_en: A german science program about mind and brain. How do we learn and think? Why do we act and feel like we do? The current brain research can give us sometimes surprising answers. Presented by Prof. Dr. Manfred Spitzer.

title: Geist & Gehirn
